ComicInfo.Summary: The end is finally here. The elder’s plan is revealed! Zechariah's final fate is decided! Wolf-Man’s astounding adventure is coming to a close. Every moment from the beginning of the series to now has been leading to this. Don’t miss this special oversized series-ending extravaganza!

ComicInfo.Title: Birth of a Hero; Legacy Part Five of Five
